title: Are the HTML tags and elements the same thing?
What are tags and attributes in HTML?
answer_1: Tags are the primary component of the HTML that defines how the content will be structured/formatted
answer_3: Tags are not the primary component
right_answer: Tags are the primary component of the HTML that defines how the content will be structured/formatted

title: What is the ‘class’ attribute in HTML?
answer_1: The class attribute is used to specify the class name for an HTML element
answer_3: The class attribute is Not primary
right_answer: The class attribute is used to specify the class name for an HTML element
